Entries.AcceptGift_(O)StardropTea: Ooohh... this is nice. I'll save it for a quiet day in the sun room.
Entries.movieTheater_memory_oneweek: It's fun to have a cinema in town. I want to go see a western!
Entries.achievement_15: Judging by the savoury smells wafting from your place, I can tell you've been busy in the kitchen!$h
Entries.summer_Sat_inlaw_Abigail: How's Abigail's health? She's always been such a pale girl. Hopefully the farm lifestyle puts a little colour in her cheeks.
Entries.fall_Mon: Autumn is Abby's favourite season, so I'm hoping she'll come out of her room more often.
Entries.winter_Sat: Don't you think Abby would look better with her natural hair colour?#$e#She used to have light chestnut-coloured hair.
Entries.winter_Wed6: Are you excited for the new year?#$e#I predict that you'll be very successful on your farm.$h
